content: पर्यायः {@--1@} Going or winding round, revolution. {@--2@} Lapse, course, expiration (of time). {@--3@} Regular recurrence or repetition. {@--4@} Turn, succession, due or regular order; पर्यायसवामुत्सृज्य <ls>Ku. 2. 36</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 32</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 87</ls>; <ls>Mu. 3. 27.</ls> {@--5@} Method, arrangement. {@--6@} Manner, way, method of proceeding. {@--7@} A synonym, convertible term; पर्यायो निधनस्यायं निर्धनत्वं शरीरिणां <ls>Pt. 2. 99</ls>; पर्वतस्य पर्याया इमे &c. {@--8@} An opportunity, occasion. {@--9@} Creation, formation, preparation, manufacture {@--10@} Comprehensiveness. {@--11@} A strophe of a hymn. {@--12@} Property, quality. {@--13@} (In <ab>Rhet.</ab>) A figure of speech; see <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; <ls>Chandr. 5. 108</ls>, <ls n="Chandr. 5.">109</ls>; <ls>S. D. 733.</ls> (Note. पर्यायेण is often used adverbially in the sense of: {@--1@} in turn or succession, by regular gradation; {@--2@} occasionally, now and then; पर्यायेण हि दृश्यंते स्वप्ताः कामं शुभाशुभाः <ls>Ve. 2. 13</ls>).
